body_html:
Also having this problem I cannot build the nsync lib with compile_nsync.sh via build_all_android.sh. compile_android_protobuf.sh fails also.

My current error is just failing to find basic headers like string.h and stdlib.h. I believe it has something to do with using the r16 NDK, have the header paths changed? I started trying to add paths to the build scripts but am unsure if this will lead to a solution.

body:
Also having this problem I cannot build the nsync lib with compile_nsync.sh via build_all_android.sh. compile_android_protobuf.sh fails also.

My current error is just failing to find basic headers like string.h and stdlib.h. I believe it has something to do with using the r16 NDK, have the header paths changed? I started trying to add paths to the build scripts but am unsure if this will lead to a solution.
